name: WitchCraft (itch) (veriking, Starylz)
description:
Controls(Keyboard + Mouse Game): 

E - Interact
Q - Quests
TAB or I - Inventory

WASD to Move

===

Witchcraft is a game where you play as Beryl, the town's friendly neighborly witch. Fulfill quests posted by the local townspeople in order to gain their favor. But beware! Not all quests are as innocent as they may seem.
